item.description: Arch Install dhcpcd? Reboot Enable network systemctl start systemd-networkd.service systemctl enable systemd-networkd.service /etc/systemd/network/20-wired.network [Match] Name=enp1s0 [Network] DHCP=yes time timedatectl set-timezone Europe/Moscow timedatectl set-ntp true hwclock --systohc --localtime locale localectl set-locale LANG=en_GB.UTF-8 locale-gen install zsh+ohmyzsh set new shell #list paths chsh -l #set shell chsh -s path_to_shell install ohmyzsh sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)"

HUGO create site_folder hugo new site sitename cd sitename git init git submodule add https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke create new post hugo new posts/post.md static page gen hugo server -D

Create cryptopartition 2 step boot LUKS cruptsetup -y luksFormat /dev/sdXY cryptsetup open /dev/sdXY new_name #new_name -> name_from_cruptsetup mkfs.btrfs /dev/mapper/name_from_cruptsetup #create file for key dd if=/dev/random bs=32 count=1 of=<filename> #write key into file cryptsetup luksAddKey /dev/<> ./keyfile /etc/crypttab #name in mapper device key-file type name_from_cruptsetup UUID=<LUKS> /etc/key_file_name luks /etc/fstab /etc/mapper/HOME
